Symbol.Script_3D:
DEFINE STYLE "aa" "Arial", 30, 7, 0 SET STYLE "aa" SHADOW OFF, OFF RESOL 5 if is_serd then start_x = 0 : start_y = 0 : start_z = 0 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, serd_height, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z-1, unID, serd_height, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z+serd_height, unID, serd_height, 2: unID=unID+1 start_x = bst : start_y = 0 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, serd_height, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z-1, unID, serd_height, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z+serd_height, unID, serd_height, 2: unID=unID+1 start_x = bst : start_y = max_t HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, serd_height, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z-1, unID, serd_height, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z+serd_height, unID, serd_height, 2: unID=unID+1 start_x = 0 : start_y = max_t HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, serd_height, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z-1, unID, serd_height, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z+serd_height, unID, serd_height, 2: unID=unID+1
hotspot bst/2,max_t/2,0 hotspot 0,max_t/2,0 hotspot bst,max_t/2,0 hotspot bst/2,0,0 hotspot bst/2,max_t,0 hotspot 0,0,0
pen p_st material "!Бетон вспомогательный со штриховкой" SECT_ATTRS f_st, 0, p_f_st, p_sech_st add -0.001,-0.001,0 BRICK bst+0.002, max_t+0.002, serd_height del 1 end endif
start_x = ac_wall_length/2 : start_y = otstup+max_t : start_z = 0 : gosub "hl_down" start_x = ac_wall_length/2 : start_y = otstup : start_z = 0 : gosub "hl_down"
start_x = ac_wall_length/2 : start_y = otstup+max_t : start_z = ac_wall_height : gosub "hl_up" start_x = ac_wall_length/2 : start_y = otstup : start_z = ac_wall_height : gosub "hl_up"
group "sten" add t_konop_left+otstup_left, otstup, otstup_down if left_str = "Сердечник" then start_x = 0 : start_y = 0 : start_z = 0 : gosub "hl_down_left" start_x = 0 : start_y = 0 : start_z = ac_wall_height_nw : gosub "hl_up_left" addz -l_down_left pen p_st material "!Бетон вспомогательный со штриховкой" SECT_ATTRS f_st, 0, p_f_st, p_sech_st add -0.001,-0.001,0 BRICK bst+0.002, max_t+0.002, h_serd_1 del 1 addz l_down_left endif if left_str <> "Нет" and t_konop_left>0 then addx -t_konop material "!Минвата" SECT_ATTRS sh_kon, 0, p_f_st, p_sech_st BRICK t_konop, max_t, ac_wall_height_nw endif del top material "!Бетон вспомогательный со штриховкой" SECT_ATTRS f_st, 0, p_f_st, p_sech_st add (left_str = "Сердечник")*bst + t_konop_left + otstup_left, otstup, otstup_down BRICK l_st, max_t, t_rastv
if show_vert then for i=shag_vert to ac_wall_height_nw-t_konop step shag_vert lin_ -t_konop_left,-diam_arm_vert/2,i,l_wall,-diam_arm_vert/2,i lin_ -t_konop_left,max_t+diam_arm_vert/2,i,l_wall,max_t+diam_arm_vert/2,i next i for i=shag_vert to l_wall step shag_vert lin_ i,-3*diam_arm_vert/2,0,i,-3*diam_arm_vert/2,ac_wall_height_nw lin_ i,max_t+3*diam_arm_vert/2,0,i,max_t+3*diam_arm_vert/2,ac_wall_height_nw next i endif
if show_gor then for i=shag_gor to ac_wall_height_nw-t_konop step shag_gor for j=20/1000 to max_t-20/1000 step 50/1000 lin_ -t_konop_left,j,i+diam_arm_gor/2,l_wall+max_t*(right_str = "Пересечение"),j,i+diam_arm_gor/2 next j for j=50/1000 to l_wall+max_t*(right_str = "Пересечение")-50/1000 step 50/1000 lin_ j,-5/1000,i-diam_arm_gor/2, j,max_t+5/1000,i-diam_arm_gor/2 next j next i endif
material "!Краска-06" fst = (l_wall - (int(l_wall/shag_krep)-1)*shag_krep)/2 for i=fst to l_wall step shag_krep addx i if mirr_in then addx l_ug rotz 180 addy -max_t*2-wt endif rasp = 2 : if is_krep_down then gosub "ug_niz" rasp = 3 : if is_krep_up then gosub "ug_niz" if mirr_in then del 3 if mirr_out then addx l_ug rotz 180 addy wt endif rasp = 1 : if is_krep_down then gosub "ug_niz" rasp = 4 : if is_krep_up then gosub "ug_niz" if mirr_out then del 3 del 1 next i
del top material "!Минвата" SECT_ATTRS sh_kon, 0, p_f_st, p_sech_st add (left_str = "Сердечник")*bst + t_konop_left + otstup_left, otstup, ac_wall_height_nw - t_konop+otstup_down BRICK l_st, max_t, t_konop del top add ac_wall_length-t_konop_right-otstup_right, otstup, otstup_down if right_str = "Сердечник" then start_x = 0 : start_y = 0 : start_z = 0 : gosub "hl_down_right" start_x = 0 : start_y = 0 : start_z = ac_wall_height_nw : gosub "hl_up_right" addx -bst addz -l_down_right material "!Бетон вспомогательный со штриховкой" SECT_ATTRS f_st, 0, p_f_st, p_sech_st add -0.001,-0.001,0 BRICK bst+0.002, max_t+0.002, h_serd_2 del 1 addz l_down_right addx bst endif
if left_str <> "Нет" and t_konop_right>0 then material "!Минвата" SECT_ATTRS sh_kon, 0, p_f_st, p_sech_st BRICK t_konop, max_t, ac_wall_height_nw endif endgroup
group "cutting body" del top dim cut_set[5] cut_set[1]=0 ! Lower Cut cut_set[2]=0 ! Upper Cut cut_set[3]=0 ! End Cuts cut_set[4]=1 ! Window/Door cut_set[5]=0 ! Connecting Walls
call "Wall Cutting Body" parameters ref_thickness=max_t*2, gs_mat=base_mat, cut_set=cut_set, ac_accessory_debug=0, gs_gdl_debug=0, ac_wall_height_nw=ac_wall_height_nw, ac_wall_radius=ac_wall_radius, ac_wall_length=ac_wall_length, ac_wall_resol=ac_wall_resol, ac_refside=ac_refside, ac_angles=ac_angles, ac_side_poly=ac_side_poly, ac_top_poly=ac_top_poly, ac_bot_poly=ac_bot_poly, ac_wd_poly=ac_wd_poly, ac_curved_wall=ac_curved_wall, ac_cont_pen=ac_cont_pen, bot_ext=0, top_ext=0 endgroup
!!------------------!! !! Solid Operations !! !!------------------!!
wall_1=subgroup("sten","cutting body") placegroup wall_1 !placegroup "sten"
base vert 0, 0, 0 vert 1, 0, 0 vert 0, 1, 0 vert 0, 0, 1 coor 2, -1, -2, -3, -4 body 1
end "ug_niz": type_krep = "ug" if rasp = 1 then rotx 90 roty 180 mulx -1 if plast_out_down then type_krep = "plast" rotx -90 addx (l_ug-l_plast)/2 addz h_plast-zas_plast endif endif if rasp = 2 then rotx 90 addz -max_t if plast_in_down then type_krep = "plast" rotx -90 addx (l_ug-l_plast)/2 addz h_plast-zas_plast endif endif if rasp = 3 then addy max_t addz ac_wall_height_nw if plast_in_up then type_krep = "plast" addx (l_ug-l_plast)/2 addz zas_plast endif endif if rasp = 4 then muly -1 addz ac_wall_height_nw if plast_out_up then type_krep = "plast" addx (l_ug-l_plast)/2 addz zas_plast endif endif roty 90 if type_krep = "ug" then PRISM_ 7, l_ug, 0,0,15, ws,0,15, ws,wt,15, wt,wt,15, wt,ds,15, 0,ds,15, 0,0,-1 else PRISM_ 5, l_plast, 0,0,15, h_plast,0,15, h_plast,t_plast,15, 0,t_plast,15, 0,0,-1 endif if rasp = 1 then if plast_out_down then del 3 del 4 else if rasp = 2 and plast_in_down then del 3 if rasp = 3 and plast_in_up then del 2 if rasp = 4 and plast_out_up then del 2 del 3 endif return
"hl_down_left": HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, l_down_left, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z+1, unID, l_down_left, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z-l_down_left, unID, l_down_left, 2: unID=unID+1 return
"hl_down_right": HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, l_down_right, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z+1, unID, l_down_right, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z-l_down_right, unID, l_down_right, 2: unID=unID+1 return
"hl_up_left": HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, l_up_left, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z-1, unID, l_up_left, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z+l_up_left, unID, l_up_left, 2: unID=unID+1 return
"hl_up_right": HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, l_up_right, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z-1, unID, l_up_right, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z+l_up_right, unID, l_up_right, 2: unID=unID+1 return
"hl_down": HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, otstup_down, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z-1, unID, otstup_down, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z+otstup_down, unID, otstup_down, 2: unID=unID+1 return
"hl_up": HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, otstup_up, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z+1, unID, otstup_up, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z-otstup_up, unID, otstup_up, 2: unID=unID+1 return
Symbol.Script_2D:
drawindex 50 if is_serd then HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, max_t, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -1, unID, max_t, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, max_t, unID, max_t, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 bst, 0, unID, max_t, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 bst, -1, unID, max_t, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 bst, max_t, unID, max_t, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, bst, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, bst, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 bst, 0, unID, bst, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, max_t, unID, bst, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, max_t, unID, bst, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 bst, max_t, unID, bst, 2: unID=unID+1
hotspot2 bst/2,max_t/2 hotspot2 0,max_t/2 hotspot2 bst,max_t/2 hotspot2 bst/2,0 hotspot2 bst/2,max_t hotspot2 0,0 fill f_st poly2 4,1+2+4,0,0,0,max_t,bst,max_t,bst,0 end endif
HOTSPOT2 0, otstup+max_t/2, unID, otstup_left, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, otstup+max_t/2, unID, otstup_left, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 otstup_left, otstup+max_t/2, unID, otstup_left, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 otstup_left, otstup+max_t/3, unID, t_konop_left, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 otstup_left-1, otstup+max_t/3, unID, t_konop_left, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 otstup_left+t_konop_left, otstup+max_t/3, unID, t_konop_left, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 t_konop_left+otstup_left, otstup, unID, max_t, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_left+otstup_left, otstup-1, unID, max_t, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_left+otstup_left, otstup+max_t, unID, max_t, 2: unID=unID+1
if ileft = max_t then HOTSPOT2 t_konop_left+otstup_left, otstup+max_t/2, unID, bst, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_left+otstup_left-1, otstup+max_t/2, unID, bst, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_left+otstup_left+bst, otstup+max_t/2, unID, bst, 2: unID=unID+1 endif
HOTSPOT2 t_konop_left+otstup_left, 0, unID, otstup, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_left+otstup_left, -1, unID, otstup, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_left+otstup_left, otstup, unID, otstup, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 t_konop_left+otstup_left, otstup+max_t*2/3, unID, ileft, 1+128,left_str: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_left+otstup_left-1, otstup+max_t*2/3, unID, ileft, 3,left_str: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_left+otstup_left+ileft, otstup+max_t*2/3, unID, ileft, 2,left_str: unID=unID+1
add2 t_konop_left+otstup_left,otstup pen p_st if left_str = "Монолит" then hotspot2 max_t/2,max_t/2 line2 0,0,max_t,max_t line2 max_t,0,0,max_t endif if left_str = "Сердечник" then hotspot2 bst/2,max_t/2 hotspot2 bst,0 hotspot2 bst,max_t fill f_st poly2 4,1+2+4,0,0,0,max_t,bst,max_t,bst,0 endif if left_str <> "Нет" and t_konop_left>0 and left_str <> "Пересечение" then pen p_f_st fill sh_kon poly2 4,1+2+4,0,0, 0,max_t, -t_konop,max_t, -t_konop,0 endif if left_str = "Пересечение" then hotspot2 -max_t,-max_t/2 line2 0,20/1000,-max_t,20/1000 line2 0,max_t-20/1000,-max_t,max_t-20/1000 line2 0,max_t*2/3, -max_t,max_t*2/3 line2 0,max_t*1/3, -max_t,max_t*1/3 for i=0 to max_t-20/1000 step 40/1000 line2 -i,max_t,-i,0 next i endif
fill 23 if is_shtr then drawindex 10 POLY2_B 4, 2+4+64,20,0, 0,0,0, l_wall,0,0, l_wall,max_t,0, 0,max_t,0 drawindex 50 endif
del top add2 ac_wall_length,0 mul2 -1,1
HOTSPOT2 0, otstup+max_t/2, unID, otstup_right, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, otstup+max_t/2, unID, otstup_right, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 otstup_right, otstup+max_t/2, unID, otstup_right, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 otstup_right, otstup+max_t/3, unID, t_konop_right, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 otstup_right-1, otstup+max_t/3, unID, t_konop_right, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 otstup_right+t_konop_right, otstup+max_t/3, unID, t_konop_right, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 t_konop_right+otstup_right, otstup, unID, max_t, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_right+otstup_right, otstup-1, unID, max_t, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_right+otstup_right, otstup+max_t, unID, max_t, 2: unID=unID+1
if iright = max_t then HOTSPOT2 t_konop_right+otstup_right, otstup+max_t/2, unID, bst, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_right+otstup_right-1, otstup+max_t/2, unID, bst, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_right+otstup_right+bst, otstup+max_t/2, unID, bst, 2: unID=unID+1 endif
HOTSPOT2 t_konop_right+otstup_right, 0, unID, otstup, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_right+otstup_right, -1, unID, otstup, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_right+otstup_right, otstup, unID, otstup, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 t_konop_right+otstup_right, otstup+max_t*2/3, unID, iright, 1+128,right_str: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_right+otstup_right-1, otstup+max_t*2/3, unID, iright, 3,right_str: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 t_konop_right+otstup_right+iright, otstup+max_t*2/3, unID, iright, 2,right_str: unID=unID+1
add2 t_konop_right+otstup_right,otstup
pen p_st if right_str = "Монолит" then hotspot2 max_t/2,max_t/2 line2 0,0,max_t,max_t line2 max_t,0,0,max_t endif if right_str = "Сердечник" then hotspot2 bst/2,max_t/2 hotspot2 bst,0 hotspot2 bst,max_t fill f_st poly2 4,1+2+4,0,0,0,max_t,bst,max_t,bst,0 endif if right_str = "Пересечение" then hotspot2 -max_t,-max_t/2 line2 0,20/1000,-max_t,20/1000 line2 0,max_t-20/1000,-max_t,max_t-20/1000 line2 0,max_t*2/3, -max_t,max_t*2/3 line2 0,max_t*1/3, -max_t,max_t*1/3 for i=0 to max_t-20/1000 step 40/1000 line2 -i,max_t,-i,0 next i endif if right_str <> "Нет" and t_konop_right>0 and right_str <> "Пересечение" then pen p_f_st fill sh_kon poly2 4,1+2+4,0,0, 0,max_t, -t_konop,max_t, -t_konop,0 endif !
Symbol.Script_1D:
dim arr[] dim emparr[] dim end_type[] end_type[1] = "Пересечение" end_type[2] = "Нет" end_type[3] = "Монолит" end_type[4] = "Сердечник"
dim iend_type[] iend_type[1] = -max_t iend_type[2] = 0 iend_type[3] = bst iend_type[4] = max_t
unID = 0 eps=0.00001
ac_wall_height_nw = ac_wall_height-otstup_down-otstup_up
if is_serd then h_arm = serd_height + l_vkl else l_st = ac_wall_length - t_konop_right - otstup_right - t_konop_left - otstup_left - (left_str = "Сердечник") * bst - (right_str = "Сердечник") * bst h_serd_1 = (ac_wall_height_nw + l_down_left + l_up_left) * (left_str = "Сердечник") h_serd_2 = (ac_wall_height_nw + l_down_right + l_up_right) * (right_str = "Сердечник") l_wall = ac_wall_length - t_konop_right - otstup_right - t_konop_left - otstup_left l_konop = l_st + (ac_wall_height_nw + l_down_left + l_up_left)*(t_konop_left>0) + (ac_wall_height_nw + l_down_right + l_up_right)*(t_konop_right>0) endif
dim empty[1][1] empty[1][1] = 0
! -------------------------------- ! Calculate the section dimensions ! --------------------------------
yl=bot_ext yh=ac_wall_height_nw-top_ext
if rHeight>0 then xh=wain_thk_b-((wain_thk_b-wain_thk)/(rHeight))*yh-((wain_thk_b-wain_thk)/(rHeight))*bot_ext height=rHeight+bot_ext parameters wain_thk_t=xh lock "wain_thk_t" else xh=wain_thk_t height=ac_wall_height_nw+bot_ext+top_ext endif
if rHeight<eps then lock "wain_thk" endif
if abs(bat_angle)<eps then xl=wain_thk_b else if rHeight>0 then xl=xh+(rHeight+bot_ext)*sin(bat_angle) else xl=xh+(ac_wall_height_nw+top_ext+bot_ext)*sin(bat_angle) endif parameters wain_thk_b=xl lock "wain_thk_b" endif
if wain_thk_t<0 then parameters uwtp=0 lock "uwtp" uwtp=0 endif
! -------------------------------- ! Scan the arrays for the last row ! --------------------------------
dim gs_bot_poly[][] if uwbp=0 then gs_bot_poly[1][1]=0 : gs_bot_poly[1][2]=0 gs_bot_poly[2][1]=ac_wall_length : gs_bot_poly[2][2]=0
ac_bot_poly=gs_bot_poly
endif bot_num=vardim1(ac_bot_poly)
dim gs_top_poly[][] if uwtp=0 then gs_top_poly[1][1]=0 : gs_top_poly[1][2]=ac_wall_height_nw gs_top_poly[2][1]=ac_wall_length : gs_top_poly[2][2]=ac_wall_height_nw
ac_top_poly=gs_top_poly endif top_num=vardim1(ac_top_poly)
sg_num=vardim1(ac_angles) if vardim2(ac_side_poly)<=2 then sp_num=0 else sp_num=vardim1(ac_side_poly) endif if vardim2(ac_wd_poly)<=2 then wd_num=0 else wd_num=vardim1(ac_wd_poly) endif
! --------------------------- ! Refill the ac_angles array ! ---------------------------
if abs(cust_bega)>eps then ac_angles[1][1]=cust_bega if abs(cust_enda)>eps then ac_angles[sg_num][2]=cust_enda
! ----------------------------------------- ! Calculate the oversize for the revolution ! -----------------------------------------
! Center point (u,v)=(0,ac_wall_radius) ! Radius r=ac_wall_radius-xl ! Equation of the circle (sec_x_beg-u)^2+(sec_y_beg-v)^2=r^2 ! Slope of the line kappa=180-ac_angles[1][1] ! Equation of the line sec_y_beg=tan(kappa)*sec_x_beg ! Equation with two unkn. (1+(tan(kappa))^2)*sec_x_beg^2-2*ac_wall_radius*tan(kappa)*sec_x_beg+2*ac_wall_radius*xl-xl^2
ref_thickness=max(xl,xh) cutting_thk=ref_thickness+0.20 if ac_wall_radius<eps then !! Staight Wall if ac_angles[1][1]>90 then over_beg=ref_thickness/tan(180-ac_angles[1][1])+0.05 else over_beg=0.05 endif if ac_angles[vardim1(ac_angles)][2]<90 then over_end=ref_thickness/tan(ac_angles[vardim1(ac_angles)][2])+0.05 else over_end=0.05 endif
over_cut_end=over_end+0.05 over_cut_beg=over_beg+0.05 else !! Curved Wall if ac_angles[1][1]<=90 then kappa=ac_angles[1][1]
a_beg=(1+(tan(kappa))^2) b_beg=-2*ac_wall_radius*tan(kappa) c_beg=2*ac_wall_radius*ref_thickness-ref_thickness^2
if b_beg^2-4*a_beg*c_beg>=0 then sec_x_beg=(-b_beg-sqr(b_beg^2-4*a_beg*c_beg))/(2*a_beg) sec_y_beg=sec_x_beg*tan(kappa) else sec_x_beg=ac_wall_radius*cos(kappa)*sin(kappa) sec_y_beg=ac_wall_radius-ac_wall_radius*cos(kappa)*cos(kappa) endif
overang_1=0 else kappa=180-ac_angles[1][1]
a_beg=(1+(tan(kappa))^2) b_beg=-2*ac_wall_radius*tan(kappa) c_beg=2*ac_wall_radius*ref_thickness-ref_thickness^2
if b_beg^2-4*a_beg*c_beg>=0 then sec_x_beg=-(-b_beg-sqr(b_beg^2-4*a_beg*c_beg))/(2*a_beg) sec_y_beg=-sec_x_beg*tan(kappa) overang_1=asn(-sec_x_beg/(ac_wall_radius-ref_thickness)) ! Iaccuray else sec_x_beg=-ac_wall_radius*cos(kappa)*sin(kappa) sec_y_beg=ac_wall_radius-ac_wall_radius*cos(kappa)*cos(kappa) overang_1=kappa endif endif
if ac_angles[sg_num][2]>=90 then lambda=180-ac_angles[sg_num][2]
a_end=(1+(tan(lambda))^2) b_end=-2*ac_wall_radius*tan(lambda) c_end=2*ac_wall_radius*ref_thickness-ref_thickness^2
if b_end^2-4*a_end*c_end>=0 then sec_x_end=-(-b_end-sqr(b_end^2-4*a_end*c_end))/(2*a_end) sec_y_end=-sec_x_end*tan(lambda) else sec_x_end=-ac_wall_radius*cos(lambda)*sin(lambda) sec_y_end=ac_wall_radius-ac_wall_radius*cos(lambda)*cos(lambda) endif
overang_2=0 else lambda=ac_angles[sg_num][2]
a_end=(1+(tan(lambda))^2) b_end=-2*ac_wall_radius*tan(lambda) c_end=2*ac_wall_radius*ref_thickness-ref_thickness^2
if b_end^2-4*a_end*c_end>=0 then sec_x_end=(-b_end-sqr(b_end^2-4*a_end*c_end))/(2*a_end) sec_y_end=sec_x_end*tan(lambda) overang_2=asn(sec_x_end/(ac_wall_radius-ref_thickness)) else sec_x_end=ac_wall_radius*cos(lambda)*sin(lambda) sec_y_end=ac_wall_radius-ac_wall_radius*cos(lambda)*cos(lambda) overang_2=lambda endif endif
over_cut_beg=sin(overang_1)*ac_wall_radius+0.05 over_cut_end=sin(overang_2)*ac_wall_radius+0.05 endif
shag_shpilek = shag_vert*2 !Шаг шпилек через стену ! ----------------------------------------------- ! Scan the window door polygons for the hole size ! ----------------------------------------------- t_gor = 0 t_vert1 = 0 t_vert2 = 0 area_hole = 0 dim wd_hole_poly[][] if wd_num<>0 then for i=1 to wd_num for j=2 to int((ac_wd_poly[i][1]+1/32")/1")*2 step 2 put ac_wd_poly[i][j] next j
wd_hole_poly[i][1]= min(use(nsp)) wd_hole_poly[i][3]= max(use(nsp))
taa = max(use(nsp)) - min(get(nsp)) for j=3 to int((ac_wd_poly[i][1]+1/32")/1")*2 step 2 put ac_wd_poly[i][j] next j
wd_hole_poly[i][2]= min(use(nsp)) wd_hole_poly[i][4]= max(use(nsp)) tbb = max(use(nsp)) - min(get(nsp)) area_hole = area_hole + abs(taa*tbb) t_gor=t_gor+(round_int(tbb / shag_gor)-1)*taa !Сколько горизонтальных сеток и какой длины вычетает отверстие t_vert1=t_vert1+(round_int(tbb / shag_vert)-1)*taa !Сколько вертикальных стержней и какой длины вычетает отверстие t_vert2=t_vert2+(round_int(taa / shag_vert)-1)*tbb !Сколько горизонтальных стержней и какой длины вычетает отверстие next i
! ---------------------------------------- ! Organize the holes into cumulative order ! ----------------------------------------
dim wd_hole[][] dim temp[][]
temp=wd_hole_poly
for z=1 to wd_num i=1 p=1 repeat if temp[i][1]<=temp[p][1] then p=p+1 else p=i i=i+1 endif until p>wd_num
wd_hole[z]=temp[i]
temp[i][1]=ac_wall_length temp[i][2]=0 temp[i][3]=0 temp[i][4]=0 next z endif
!--------- Уголок l_ug = 140/1000 ws = 80/1000 ds = ws wt = 4/1000 !--------- Пластина l_plast = 100/1000 h_plast = 180/1000 t_plast = 5/1000 zas_plast = 90/1000
l_max_gor = 6
shag_arm_gor = 50/1000 area_wall = l_wall * ac_wall_height_nw area_wall_h = l_wall * ac_wall_height_nw - area_hole n_gor_r = round_int(ac_wall_height_nw / shag_gor) !Кол-во рядов n_gor_l = round_int(l_wall / (l_max_gor-0.5)) !Количество сеток в ряде n_del = int(t_l / l_max_gor) !Количество сеток, вычитаемых проёмами n_set = n_gor_r*n_gor_l - n_del !Общее кол-во сеток s_kirp = l_wall * ac_wall_height_nw - area_hole v_kirp = s_kirp * max_t l_vert = (round_int(ac_wall_height_nw/shag_vert)*l_wall + round_int(l_wall/shag_vert)*ac_wall_height_nw - t_vert1 - t_vert2)*2 area_vert = s_kirp*2
n_krepug = 0 n_krepplast = 0 n_krep_side = round_int(l_wall/shag_krep)+1 if is_krep_up then if plast_in_up then n_krepplast = n_krepplast + n_krep_side else n_krepug = n_krepug + n_krep_side endif if plast_out_up then n_krepplast = n_krepplast + n_krep_side else n_krepug = n_krepug + n_krep_side endif endif if is_krep_down then if plast_in_down then n_krepplast = n_krepplast + n_krep_side else n_krepug = n_krepug + n_krep_side endif if plast_out_down then n_krepplast = n_krepplast + n_krep_side else n_krepug = n_krepug + n_krep_side endif endif
n_petl = round_int(ac_wall_height_nw/shag_krep)*(left_str = "Монолит") + round_int(ac_wall_height_nw/shag_krep)*(right_str = "Монолит") n_shpilek = round_int((area_wall_h/(shag_shpilek*shag_shpilek))) l_shpilek = max_t + 2*75/1000 l_hom = bst*2 + max_t*2 + 200/1000 if is_serd then n_hom_1 = round_int(h_serd_1/shag_hom) n_hom_2 = round_int(h_serd_2/shag_hom) n_hom = n_hom_1 + n_hom_2 l_arm = (h_serd_1+h_serd_2+l_vkl*(h_serd_1>0 or h_serd_2>0))*4 v_bet = (h_serd_1+h_serd_2)*bst*max_t*1.05 else n_hom = round_int(serd_height/shag_hom) l_arm = (serd_height + l_vkl)*4 v_bet = serd_height*bst*max_t*1.05 endif
m_w = "" if wall_type = "Стена" then m_w = "Стены " if wall_type = "Перегородка" then m_w = "Перегородки " if wall_mat = "Кирпич" then m_w = "Кирп. " if wall_mat = "Газобетон" then m_w = "Г/б "
if mun_subpos then marka_sten = subpos else marka_sten = m_w + "tст=" + str("%.0mm",max_t) + "мм" endif wall_scp = "Устройство " wall_obozn = "" if wall_type = "Стена" then wall_scp =wall_scp + "стен " if wall_type = "Перегородка" then wall_scp =wall_scp + "перегородок " wall_scp =wall_scp + " t=" + str("%.0mm",max_t) + "мм. " if wall_mat = "Кирпич" then wall_scp = wall_scp + "из кирпича" wall_obozn = "ГОСТ 530-2012" endif if wall_mat = "Газобетон" then wall_scp = wall_scp + "из газобетона" wall_obozn = "ГОСТ 21520-89" endif
!!----------------!! !! Debug Function !! !!----------------!!
Symbol.Script_VL:
parameters marka_st_osn = "A500C" parameters marka_st_hom = "A-I(A240)" parameters marka_vert = marka_st_osn parameters diam_arm_st_hom = 8/1000 parameters diam_arm_st_osn = 10/1000 parameters diam_arm_vert = 6/1000 parameters l_max_gor = l_max_gor
if rHeight<0 then parameters rHeight=0 values "gs_detleftel_2D" `Детальный`,`Простой` values "gs_detleftel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.`
values "left_str" end_type values "right_str" end_type values "ileft" iend_type values "iright" iend_type values "bst" range[0.13,1] values "t_konop_left" 0,t_konop values "t_konop_right" 0,t_konop
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "left_str" then var = left_str : arr = end_type : gosub "get_inx" : ileft = iend_type[inx] parameters ileft = ileft endif if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ileft" then var = ileft : arr = iend_type : gosub "get_inx" : left_str = end_type[inx] parameters left_str = left_str endif if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "right_str" then var = right_str : arr = end_type : gosub "get_inx" : iright = iend_type[inx] parameters iright = iright endif if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "iright" then var = iright : arr = iend_type : gosub "get_inx" : right_str = end_type[inx] parameters right_str = right_str endif
if left_str = "Монолит" then parameters t_konop_left = t_konop if right_str = "Монолит" then parameters t_konop_right = t_konop
if left_str = "Сердечник" then parameters t_konop_left = 0 if right_str = "Сердечник" then parameters t_konop_right = 0
if left_str = "Пересечение" then parameters t_konop_left = 0 if right_str = "Пересечение" then parameters t_konop_right = 0
values "wall_mat" "Кирпич", "Газобетон" values "wall_type" "Стена", "Перегородка"
if wall_mat = "Кирпич" and max_t=0.12 then wall_type = "Перегородка" if wall_mat = "Кирпич" and max_t>0.12 then wall_type = "Стен"
if wall_mat = "Кирпич" then values "max_t" 0.12,0.25,0.38,0.51
parameters area_hole = area_hole parameters area_wall = l_wall * ac_wall_height_nw parameters area_wall_h = l_wall * ac_wall_height_nw - area_hole
values "shag_gor" range[max_t,0.7]
parameters marka_setki = "Сг-" + str("%.0cm",max_t) if not(mun_subpos) then parameters subpos = marka_sten if is_serd then HIDEPARAMETER "_sp0_B", "_sp0_C", "t_konop_right", "l_down_left", "l_down_right", "l_up_left", "l_up_right" else HIDEPARAMETER "serd_height" if left_str<>"Сердечник" and right_str<>"Сердечник" then HIDEPARAMETER "_sp0_A" endif endif
end "get_inx": inx = 0 for i = 1 to vardim1(arr) if arr[i] = var then inx = i next i arr = emparr return

Length.Name: l_vert
Length.Description: "Общая длина верт. арматуры с двух сторон"

RealNum.Name: area_vert
RealNum.Description: "Общая площадь верт. арматуры с двух сторон"

Symbol.Script_PR:
call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="45", subpos = marka_sten, pos = marka_sten, obozn=" ", naen=marka_sten, kol_vo_spec=1, komment=" ", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z
if is_serd then gosub "bst_t" else !---------- Сетка горизонтальная gosub "gor" !---------- Сетка вертикальная gosub "vert" !---------- Крепление уголком снизу и сверху if n_krepplast>0 then for i=1 to n_krepplast gosub "plast" next i endif if n_krepug>0 then for i=1 to n_krepug gosub "ugl" next i endif !---------- if left_str = "Сердечник" or right_str = "Сердечник" then gosub "bst_t" if left_str = "Монолит" or right_str = "Монолит" then for i=1 to n_petl gosub "petl" next i endif endif
end "petl": pos_det = "МД-2("+str("%.0cm",max_t)+")" subpos_det = marka_sten + subpos_delim + pos_det call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="45", subpos = subpos_det, pos = pos_det, obozn="", naen="Деталь "+pos_det, ves=0, kol_vo_spec=1, komment=" ", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="20", subpos = subpos_det, pos = "2", tip_konstr="Стены", stal_gost='ГОСТ 27772-88', mater='С235', obozn='ГОСТ 19903-74', tip_profile="-- 4", dlin_prof=0.05*0.06, ves=40, naen="--4x60x50", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="40", subpos =subpos_det, pos = "1", obozn="ГОСТ 28778-90", naen="БСР M10x100 ВСт3пс2", ves=0.06, kol_vo_spec=1, komment="", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="10", subpos = subpos_det, pos = "3", marka=marka_st_hom, diam_arm=diam_arm_vert, dlin_st=max_t*4+2*50/1000, kol_vo_spec=1, fon=0, plit=0, gnut=1, otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z return
"bst_t": call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="10", subpos = marka_sten, pos = "3", marka=marka_st_hom, diam_arm=diam_arm_st_hom, dlin_st=l_hom, kol_vo_spec=n_hom, fon=0, plit=0, gnut=1, otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="10", subpos = marka_sten, pos = "4", marka=marka_st_osn, diam_arm=diam_arm_st_osn, dlin_st=1, kol_vo_spec=l_arm, fon=1, plit=0, gnut=0, otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="30", subpos = marka_sten, pos = "", obozn="", naen="Бетон В25", ves=0, kol_vo_spec=v_bet, komment="куб.м.", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="40", subpos =marka_sten, pos = "", obozn="", naen="Крепление к ж/б каркасу", ves=0, kol_vo_spec=1, komment="", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z return
"gor": pos_det = marka_setki subpos_det = marka_sten + subpos_delim + pos_det call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="45", subpos = subpos_det, pos = pos_det, obozn="", naen="Сетка " + marka_setki, ves=0, kol_vo_spec=n_set, komment="длина ед. "+str("%.0m", l_max_gor) + "м.", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="10", subpos = subpos_det, pos = "1", marka=marka_gor, diam_arm=diam_arm_gor, dlin_st=l_max_gor, kol_vo_spec=round_int(max_t/shag_arm_gor)*n_set, fon=0, plit=0, gnut=0, otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="10", subpos = subpos_det, pos = "2", marka=marka_gor, diam_arm=diam_arm_gor, dlin_st=(max_t+10/1000), kol_vo_spec=(round_int(l_max_gor/shag_arm_gor)-1)*n_set, fon=0,plit=0,gnut=0, otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z return
"vert": call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="10", subpos = marka_sten, pos = "1", marka=marka_vert, diam_arm=diam_arm_vert, dlin_st=1, kol_vo_spec=l_vert, fon=1, plit=0, gnut=0, otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="10", subpos = marka_sten, pos = "2", marka=marka_st_hom, diam_arm=diam_arm_vert, dlin_st=l_shpilek, kol_vo_spec=n_shpilek, fon=0, plit=0, gnut=1, otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z if spec_mat then call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="30", subpos =marka_sten, pos = "", obozn="", naen="Штук. ц/п М100 t=30мм.", ves=0, kol_vo_spec=area_vert, komment="кв.м.", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="30", subpos =marka_sten, pos = "", obozn=wall_obozn, naen=wall_scp, ves=0, kol_vo_spec=s_kirp, komment="кв.м.", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z endif return
"ugl": pos_det = "МД-1" subpos_det = marka_sten + subpos_delim + pos_det call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="45", subpos = subpos_det, pos = pos_det, obozn="", naen="Деталь МД-1", ves=0, kol_vo_spec=1, komment=" ", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="20", subpos = subpos_det, pos = "2", tip_konstr="Стены", stal_gost='ГОСТ 27772-88', mater='С235', obozn='ГОСТ 19771-93', tip_profile="L80x4", dlin_prof=l_ug, ves=4.16, naen="", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="40", subpos = subpos_det, pos = "1", obozn="ГОСТ 28778-90", naen="БСР M10x100 ВСт3пс2", ves=0.06, kol_vo_spec=1, komment="", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z return
"plast": pos_det = "МД-3" subpos_det = marka_sten + subpos_delim + pos_det call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="45", subpos = subpos_det, pos = pos_det, obozn="", naen="Деталь МД-3", ves=0, kol_vo_spec=1, komment=" ", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="20", subpos = subpos_det, pos = "2", tip_konstr="Стены", stal_gost='ГОСТ 27772-88', mater='С235', obozn='ГОСТ 19903-74', tip_profile="-- 5", dlin_prof=0.18*0.1, ves=40, naen="--5x180x100", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="40", subpos = subpos_det, pos = "1", obozn="ГОСТ 28778-90", naen="БСР M10x100 ВСт3пс2", ves=0.06, kol_vo_spec=1, komment="", otm_elem=ac_bottomlevel+SYMB_POS_Z return
